verses.verse: Now after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Joshua <WH3091> it came to pass, that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> asked <WH7592> the LORD <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Who shall go up <WH5927> for us against the Canaanites <WH3669> first <WH8462>, to fight <WH3898> against them?
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559>, Judah <WH3063> shall go up <WH5927>: behold, I have delivered <WH5414> the land <WH776> into his hand <WH3027>.

And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> unto Simeon <WH8095> his brother <WH251>, Come up <WH5927> with me into my lot <WH1486>, that we may fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites <WH3669>; and I likewise will go <WH1980> with thee into thy lot <WH1486>. So Simeon <WH8095> went <WH3212> with him.

And Judah <WH3063> went up <WH5927>; and the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522> into their hand <WH3027>: and they slew <WH5221> of them in Bezek <WH966> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376>.
And they found <WH4672> Adonibezek <WH137> in Bezek <WH966>: and they fought <WH3898> against him, and they slew <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522>.
But Adonibezek <WH137> fled <WH5127>; and they pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> him, and caught <WH270> him, and cut off <WH7112> his thumbs <WH931> <WH3027> and his great toes <WH7272>.

And Adonibezek <WH137> said <WH559>, Threescore and ten <WH7657> kings <WH4428>, having their thumbs <WH931> <WH3027> and their great toes <WH7272> cut off <WH7112>, gathered <WH3950> their meat under my table <WH7979>: as I have done <WH6213>, so God <WH430> hath requited <WH7999> me. And they brought <WH935> him to Jerusalem <WH3389>, and there he died <WH4191>. their thumbs: Heb. the thumbs of their hands and of their feet gathered: or, gleaned

Now the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> had fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389>, and had taken <WH3920> it, and smitten <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and set <WH7971> the city <WH5892> on fire <WH784>.

And afterward <WH310> the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> went down <WH3381> to fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites <WH3669>, that dwelt <WH3427> in the mountain <WH2022>, and in the south <WH5045>, and in the valley <WH8219>. valley: or, low country

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH3212> against the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> in Hebron <WH2275>: (now the name <WH8034> of Hebron <WH2275> before <WH6440> was Kirjatharba <WH7153>:) and they slew <WH5221> Sheshai <WH8344>, and Ahiman <WH289>, and Talmai <WH8526>.
And from thence he went <WH3212> against the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir <WH1688>: and the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> before <WH6440> was Kirjathsepher <WH7158>:
And Caleb <WH3612> said <WH559>, He that smiteth <WH5221> Kirjathsepher <WH7158>, and taketh <WH3920> it, to him will I give <WH5414> Achsah <WH5915> my daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz <WH7073>, Caleb's <WH3612> younger <WH6996> brother <WH251>, took <WH3920> it: and he gave <WH5414> him Achsah <WH5915> his daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And it came to pass, when she came <WH935> to him, that she moved <WH5496> him to ask <WH7592> of her father <WH1> a field <WH7704>: and she lighted <WH6795> from off her ass <WH2543>; and Caleb <WH3612> said <WH559> unto her, What wilt thou?

And she said <WH559> unto him, Give <WH3051> me a blessing <WH1293>: for thou hast given <WH5414> me a south <WH5045> land <WH776>; give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water <WH4325>. And Caleb <WH3612> gave <WH5414> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543> and the nether <WH8482> springs <WH1543>.

And the children <WH1121> of the Kenite <WH7017>, Moses' <WH4872> father in law <WH2859>, went up <WH5927> out of the city <WH5892> of palm trees <WH8558> <WH5899> with the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Judah <WH3063>, which lieth in the south <WH5045> of Arad <WH6166>; and they went <WH3212> and dwelt <WH3427> among <WH854> the people <WH5971>.

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH3212> with Simeon <WH8095> his brother <WH251>, and they slew <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> that inhabited <WH3427> Zephath <WH6857>, and utterly destroyed <WH2763> it. And the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was called <WH7121> Hormah <WH2767>.
Also Judah <WH3063> took <WH3920> Gaza <WH5804> with the coast <WH1366> thereof, and Askelon <WH831> with the coast <WH1366> thereof, and Ekron <WH6138> with the coast <WH1366> thereof.

And the LORD <WH3068> was with Judah <WH3063>; and he drave out <WH3423> the inhabitants of the mountain <WH2022>; but could not <WH3808> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the valley <WH6010>, because they had chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>. drave: or, possessed the mountain
And they gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> unto Caleb <WH3612>, as Moses <WH4872> said <WH1696>: and he expelled <WH3423> thence the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>.

And the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> did not drive out <WH3423> the Jebusites <WH2983> that inhabited <WH3427> Jerusalem <WH3389>; but the Jebusites <WH2983> dwell <WH3427> with the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> in Jerusalem <WH3389> unto this day <WH3117>.
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130>, they also went up <WH5927> against Bethel <WH1008>: and the LORD <WH3068> was with them.
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> sent to descry <WH8446> Bethel <WH1008>. (Now the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> before <WH6440> was Luz <WH3870>.)

And the spies <WH8104> saw <WH7200> a man <WH376> come forth <WH3318> out of the city <WH5892>, and they said <WH559> unto him, Shew <WH7200> us, we pray thee, the entrance <WH3996> into the city <WH5892>, and we will shew <WH6213> thee mercy <WH2617>.

And when he shewed <WH7200> them the entrance <WH3996> into the city <WH5892>, they smote <WH5221> the city <WH5892> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; but they let go <WH7971> the man <WH376> and all his family <WH4940>.

And the man <WH376> went <WH3212> into the land <WH776> of the Hittites <WH2850>, and built <WH1129> a city <WH5892>, and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> thereof Luz <WH3870>: which is the name <WH8034> thereof unto this day <WH3117>.

Neither did Manasseh <WH4519> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants of Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns <WH1323>, nor Taanach <WH8590> and her towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and her towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Ibleam <WH2991> and her towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and her towns <WH1323>: but the Canaanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in that land <WH776>.
And it came to pass, when Israel <WH3478> was strong <WH2388>, that they put <WH7760> the Canaanites <WH3669> to tribute <WH4522>, and did not utterly <WH3423> drive them out <WH3423>.
Neither did Ephraim <WH669> drive out <WH3423> the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> in Gezer <WH1507>; but the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> in Gezer <WH1507> among <WH7130> them.

Neither did Zebulun <WH2074> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Kitron <WH7003>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Nahalol <WH5096>; but the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> among <WH7130> them, and became tributaries <WH4522>.

Neither did Asher <WH836> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Accho <WH5910>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Zidon <WH6721>, nor of Ahlab <WH303>, nor of Achzib <WH392>, nor of Helbah <WH2462>, nor of Aphik <WH663>, nor of Rehob <WH7340>:
But the Asherites <WH843> dwelt <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites <WH3669>, the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>: for they did not drive them out <WH3423>.

Neither did Naphtali <WH5321> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Bethanath <WH1043>; but he dwelt <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites <WH3669>, the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>: nevertheless the inhabitants <WH3427> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> and of Bethanath <WH1043> became tributaries <WH4522> unto them.
And the Amorites <WH567> forced <WH3905> the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> into the mountain <WH2022>: for they would not suffer <WH5414> them to come down <WH3381> to the valley <WH6010>:

But the Amorites <WH567> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in mount <WH2022> Heres <WH2776> in Aijalon <WH357>, and in Shaalbim <WH8169>: yet the hand <WH3027> of the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> prevailed <WH3513>, so that they became tributaries <WH4522>. prevailed: Heb. was heavy
And the coast <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567> was from the going up <WH4608> to Akrabbim <WH4610>, from the rock <WH5553>, and upward <WH4605>. the going: or, Maalehakrabbim
